TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit RIPEMD160 extends System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm
Public MustInherit Class RIPEMD160 Inherits HashAlgorithm

summary.span: 表示 MD160 哈希算法的所有实现均从中继承的抽象类。

span.span: Represents the abstract class from which all implementations of the MD160 hash algorithm inherit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 哈希函数的二进制字符串映射到固定长度的小型二进制字符串的任意长度。Hash functions map binary strings of an arbitrary length to small binary strings of a fixed length. 加密哈希函数具有它不能通过计算找到为相同的值; 该哈希的两个不同的输入属性即如果还将相应的数据匹配，则应与匹配的两个数据集的哈希值。A cryptographic hash function has the property that it is computationally infeasible to find two distinct inputs that hash to the same value; that is, hashes of two sets of data should match if the corresponding data also matches. 中大型不可预测的哈希变化的数据结果的小改动。Small changes to the data result in large unpredictable changes in the hash. Ripemd-160 是 160 位加密哈希函数。RIPEMD-160 is a 160-bit cryptographic hash function. 它旨在以用作 128 位哈希函数 MD4、 MD5 和 RIPEMD 替换。It is intended for use as a replacement for the 128-bit hash functions MD4, MD5, and RIPEMD. RIPEMD 被开发欧洲项目 RIPE （争用完整性基元评估版，1988年 1992年） 的框架。RIPEMD was developed in the framework of the EU project RIPE (RACE Integrity Primitives Evaluation, 1988-1992). > [!NOTE] > 通过安全哈希算法 sha-256 和 SHA 512 和它们的派生的类，已被取代。 has been superseded by the Secure Hash Algorithms SHA-256 and SHA-512 and their derived classes. 和提供更好的安全和性能比。 and offer better security and performance than . 使用仅为与旧的应用程序和数据的兼容性。Use only for compatibility with legacy applications and data. ## Examples 下面的代码示例计算目录中的所有文件的哈希。The following code example calculates the hash for all files in a directory. [!code-cpp[RIPEMD160#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/RIPEMD160/CPP/ripemd160.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RIPEMD160#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/RIPEMD160/CS/ripemd160.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RIPEMD160#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/RIPEMD160/vb/ripemd160.vb#1)]

exception.span: 该算法在使用时启用了联邦信息处理标准 (FIPS) 模式，但它与 FIPS 不兼容。

span.span: The algorithm was used with Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) mode enabled, but it is not FIPS-compatible.

exception.span: 由 参数描述的算法在使用时启用了联邦信息处理标准 (FIPS) 模式，但它与 FIPS 不兼容。

span.span: The algorithm described by the parameter was used with Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) mode enabled, but it is not FIPS-compatible.
